headline: Comcast Breaks Ground in the Rural Area of Kings County to Connect Homes and Businesses to High-Speed Internet
summary: Comcast Investment in Kings County Connects Thousands of Homes and Businesses to Multi-Gig Speeds Comcast Comcast Lemoore, California, Oct. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Comcast, in partnership with the County of Kings, hosted a groundbreaking ceremony in Lemoore, Calif., on Oct. 28 to kick off its new rural expansion broadband project. The project will bring Comcast’s reliable, high-speed, symmetrical Xfinity broadband network to over 4,000 locations in Kings County and is expected to be complet

headline: Did Comcast's (CMCSA) Expansion of NOW TV Latino Just Shift Its Streaming Investment Narrative?
summary: Comcast recently announced a major expansion of its NOW TV Latino streaming service, adding Univision, ViX Premium with Ads, over 100 new streaming channels, and enhanced features for Xfinity Internet customers at a promotional monthly rate before a scheduled price increase on November 12. This expansion highlights Comcast's commitment to growing its Spanish-language and bilingual content offering, reflecting an ongoing push to attract diverse audiences and strengthen its position in the...

headline: Viamedia Welcomes the Court’s Decision that Its Longstanding Antitrust Case Against Comcast Should Proceed to Trial on October 5, 2026
summary: LEXINGTON, Ky., October 28, 2025--Viamedia’s antitrust case against Comcast will go to trial October 5, 2026, reinforcing the fight for open competition in TV and digital ad markets.

headline: Comcast Gears Up to Report Q3 Earnings: What's in the Cards?
summary: CMCSA's Q3 outlook shows growth in wireless and streaming, but execution costs and ad headwinds may drag results.

headline: Why ‘Yellowstone’ Mastermind Taylor Sheridan Decided to Ditch Paramount
summary: The creator of hits like “Tulsa King” and “Landman” is leaving the entertainment company after tension with new Paramount CEO David Ellison’s leadership team.
